oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1856 report card from Memphis Conference Female Institute, Jackson, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the report card, called a circular, of Sarah Taylor of Haywood County, Tennessee. She attended the Memphis Conference Female Institute in Jackson, Tennessee. The Memphis Conference Female Institute began in 1843 under the auspices of the Memphis Conference of the Methodist Church. The school was later renamed Lambuth University to honor an Methodist missionary.
